inputs.content: the length of the suspected beard was < 5 millimetres
the suspected beard occurred on or below the chin
the suspected beard existed in an uninterrupted line from the front of one ear to the front of the other ear below the nose

outputs.content: the suspected beard was a beard
outputs.name: the fact that the facial hair was a beard

inputs: the fact that the facial hair was a beard

inputs.name: the defendant's act of wearing the suspected beard

inputs.content: the office of {the Department of Beards} granted an exemption authorizing the defendant's act of wearing the suspected beard

outputs.content: {the defendant} committed the offense of a beard without exemption
outputs.name: the defendant's act of wearing the suspected beard

statement.content: the office of the Department of Beards granted an exemption authorizing the defendant's act of wearing the suspected beard
statement.name: the Department of Beards granted the defendant's beard exemption

outputs.to_effect: the Department of Beards granted the defendant's beard exemption
